import React, { Component } from 'react' import WrapComponents from '@/components/wrapper' import { Radio } from '@/components/radio' import Stepper from '@/components/stepper' import './index.scss' class StepFive extends Component { state = { steps: ['Channel', 'Message', 'Segmentation', 'Scheduling', 'Overview'], } saveAndContinue = e => { e.preventDefault() this.props.nextStep() } back = e => { e.preventDefault() this.props.prevStep() } handleInputFields(key, value) { if (!value) { this.setState({ [key]: value, }) } else { this.setState({ [key]: value, }) } } render() { const { steps, tittle, message } = this.state return (
Channel
Campaign Name
Campaign Channel
Campaign Type
Messages
Scheduling
Segmentation
Send Test Notification
) } } export default StepFive
